SEARCH
Package net.zypr.menuAPI.implementation

Class SimpleMenu

java.lang.Object
net.zypr.menuAPI.implementation.AbstractMenu
net.zypr.menuAPI.implementation.SimpleMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Menu
public class SimpleMenu extends AbstractMenu
A simple implementation of the AbstractMenu class. Provides utility methods for creating menus with basic functionality, such as filling the borders of the menu with specific items.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • SimpleMenu

      public SimpleMenu(String title, int rows)
      Constructs a new SimpleMenu with the specified title and number of rows.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the menu
      rows - the number of rows in the menu

  • Method Details

    • fillBorders

      public void fillBorders(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack filters)
      Fills the borders of the menu with the specified item. The borders include the first and last columns, as well as the first and last rows.
      Parameters:
      filters - the ItemStack to use for the border
